p: The leaves of Crassocephalum rubens were obtained from Oyi farmland, Ora-Igbomina, Osun State Nigeria. The leaves were authenticated at the Forestry Research Institute of Nigeria, Ibadan Nigeria. A sample of the plant portion was deposited at the Institute's Herbarium with voucher number FHI 112047. The leaves were plucked out from the stem, and air-dried at 25 Â°C. The dried leaves were then ground.
